title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary 
Increase of Official Controls and Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and 
Feed of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (temporary increase official control emergency measure import food feed non-animal origin) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 9 of 2020) are amended in Regulation 3(1), by 
substituting for the definition of “Regulation 2019/1793” the following – 

“‘Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2019/1793 of 22 October 2019 as amended by Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 2020, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2020/1540 of 22 October 2020, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/608 of 14 April 2021, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1900 of 27 October 2021, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/2246 of 15 December 2021, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2022/913 of 30 May 2022, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 January 2023, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2023/1110 of 6 June 2023 and Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2024/286 of 16 January 2024;”. 

1 L.17.01.2024 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No.2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 393 of 2023) are revoked. 

[176] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 April, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [176]

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations update existing Regulations with regard to additional levels 
of controls on the import of certain food of non-animal origin from specific 
third countries with regard to pesticide residues and on the import of certain 
feed of non-animal origin from specific third countries. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [176] 5
